title: OVAL Three Bedroom Apartment for Sale on DEAL Place, Colombo 03.
details:
BRAND NEW Three Bedroom apartment for immediate sale on Deal Place Colombo 03.

Brand new, with direct sea views from the living room and pool views from the opposite end.
In addition to the below luxury specs, this apartment has been further customised to include concealed AC units for all rooms.
Balconies have also been added making the floor space a total of 2000 sq-ft, flooring has also been updated to higher spec tiling and wood.

Master Bedroom Apartment with en-suite toilet and two bedrooms with a common toilet.

Large living & Dining Area which has a beautiful view of the sea.

Fully equipped Kitchen.

Maids Room & Toilet.

Other Facilities Such as:
Swimming Pool
Gym
Recreation area (for parties and events)
Rooftop terrace
Car Park

For Viewing And Other Further Information of the apartment, Please Do Not Hesitate In Contacting Us
